bibl.title: A New Customs Receipt from Philadelphia at Philadelphia and the limØn M°mfevw. <limen Mempheos>
bibl.note: Part of the small private collection assembled by Dr. Camden Cobern and sold in 1920 to the University of Pennsylvania. Receipt issued for the collection of the limØn M°mfevw-tax at the customs-house of Philadelphia. October 14, AD 216. <limen Mempheos>
COTTIER Michel, A New Customs Receipt from Philadelphia at Philadelphia and the limØn M°mfevw. <limen Mempheos>
